notes.text:
This update for quagga fixes the following issue:

Security issue fixed:
- CVE-2016-4049: Fix for a buffer overflow error in bgp_dump_routes_func. (bsc#977012)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The bgp_dump_routes_func function in bgpd/bgp_dump.c in Quagga does not perform size checks when dumping data, which might allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon crash) via a large BGP packet.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
